content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];

--ABFSS PROTOCOL
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result];


    --Examin the data types for the columns

    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    '

---MAX LENGTH OF COLUMNS

SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) as len_locationid,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) as len_locationid,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) as len_locationid,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) as len_locationid
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result];


    --USE WITH TO PROVIDE EXPLICIT DATA TYPES
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
            LocationID SMALLINT,
            Borough VARCHAR(15),
            Zone VARCHAR(50),
            service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result];

    --CREATE NEW DB

    Create DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

    use nyc_taxi_discovery;

    alter DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

    --Deal with no headers

    SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
       -- HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
     WITH (
            service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4,
            Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
            LocationID SMALLINT 1,
            Zone VARCHAR(50) 3
    )
    AS [result];


---FIX column names

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        --HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
            location_ID SMALLINT 1,
            borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
            Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
            service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )
    AS [result];


--Create external data source

Create EXTERNAL data SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH(

    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl711.dfs.core.windows.net'
)
